deep.tarot.p1: 1) Focus: note the card's message in one sentence.
deep.tarot.p2: 2) Communication: choose a kind, clear word today.
deep.coffee.p1: Combine rim/base patterns; repeated marks show habits.
deep.palm.p1: Read heart and head lines separately.
deep.dream.p1: Notice your symbol 3 times today; jot quick notes.
energy.generic.low: Keep it gentle; one breath and one intention.
energy.generic.high: Add a bold step; set a clear target.
daily.tip.1: Start with one small, concrete task.
daily.tip.2: One kind sentence clears the air.
daily.tip.3: Three deep breaths before you decide.
